General.Name: Brikor Ltd
General.Description: Brikor Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells clay products in South Africa. It operates through two segments, Bricks and Coal. The company is involved in the provision of semi-face and stock bricks; coal and clay mining operations; and transportation services and ancillary products. It serves customers in housing, residential, commercial, industrial, civil engineering, and infrastructure projects. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nigel, South Africa.
General.Address: 1 Nigel Marievale Road, Nigel, South Africa, 1490
